head.label.name: ยง
head.headtext: Ensuring the Efficient Use of Resources

para.paratext: It can be argued that in a capitalist country, intellectual property is protected to ensure the efficient use of scarce resources. Knowledge per se may not be a scarce resource, but knowledge acquired by one entity acquires its value, in part, as a result of the fact that it is kept in secret.
